Package controllers

Class MainGameController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.util.EventListener
public class MainGameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener
Class providing the controller for the processes related to the main gameplay

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int SPIN_COMPONENT_CARD
    Code for a card (in particular, specific types of blue cards) requesting a wheel spin
    static int SPIN_COMPONENT_SPACE
    Code for a space (in particular, a Get Married magenta space) is requesting a wheel spin

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    MainGameController​(MainScreen mainScr, GameMaster game)
    Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to the main screen and the central class providing all the methods necessary to play the game as parameters

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
    Invoked when an action occurs
    Card getCard()
    Returns the active card (the card drawn by the player at specific points in the game)
    ColoredSpace getColoredSpace()
    Returns the active colored space (that is, the colored space where the current player landed)
    java.util.ArrayList<HouseCard> getHouseCards()
    Returns all the available house cards
    Card getOtherCard()
    Returns the other active card (the other card drawn by the player at specific points in the game, such as in the case when two cards are drawn on a College Career Choice space)
    int getSpinComponent()
    Returns the code of the component of the game requesting for the spin (the component is either a space or a card): SPIN_COMPONENT_CARD or SPIN_COMPONENT_SPACE
    void setCard​(Card c)
    Sets the active card to the one specified
    void setOtherCard​(Card d)
    Sets the other card to the one specified (such as in the case when two cards are drawn on a College Career Choice space)
    void windowActivated​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when the Window is set to be the active Window
    void windowClosed​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when a window has been closed as the result of calling dispose on the window
    void windowClosing​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when the user attempts to close the window from the window's system menu
    void windowDeactivated​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when a window is no longer the active window
    void windowDeiconified​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when a window is changed from a minimized to a normal state
    void windowIconified​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when a window is changed from a normal to a minimized state
    void windowOpened​(java.awt.event.WindowEvent e)
    Invoked when a window is made visible

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • MainGameController

      public MainGameController​(MainScreen mainScr, GameMaster game)
      Creates a controller object with the graphical user interface related to the main screen and the central class providing all the methods necessary to play the game as parameters
      Parameters:
      mainScr - Graphical user interface related to the actual (main) screen of the game proper
      game - Central class providing access to all the methods necessary to play the game
